ui::Button Class Referenceabstract

Documentation

This class implements a button that can be pressed by the user. It implements the timing for button actuations, button holds, presses and releases. It is an abstract class where the inheriting classes must implement the ui::Button::get_value() method which returns the value of input.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ui::Button::Button ( )

This constructs a new button

Member Function Documentation

ui::Event ui::Button::event ( )

This method checks the state of the actuation and then returns an Event if needed.

It will report the following events

  • ui::Event::BUTTON_PRESSED
  • ui::Event::BUTTON_RELEASED
  • ui::Event::BUTTON_ACTUATED
  • ui::Event::BUTTON_HOLD
virtual bool ui::Button::get_actuated ( )
virtual

Returns true if the button was pressed then released This will return true only once per button press.

virtual u32 ui::Button::get_duration ( )
virtual

Returns the duration of the last button press. This method will only return a non-zero value once per button press.

virtual bool ui::Button::get_held ( u32  msec)
virtual

Returns true if the button has been held for the specified duration This will only return true once per button press.

Parameters
msecThe number of milliseconds the button has been held for
virtual bool ui::Button::get_pressed ( )
virtual

Returns true if the button has been pressed. This will only return true once per button press.

virtual bool ui::Button::get_released ( )
virtual

Returns true if the button has been released. This will only return true one time for each button press.

static u32 ui::Button::held_duration ( )
inlinestatic

This method accesses how long the user must hold the button in the application before the ui::Event::BUTTON_HOLD is triggered when calling event()

Returns
The duration in milliseconds
bool ui::Button::is_active ( )
inline

Returns true if the button is currently in the active state. The active state is updated each time Button::update() is called.

virtual void ui::Button::reset ( )
virtual

Reset the state of the button

static void ui::Button::set_held_duration ( u32  v)
inlinestatic

This method sets the duration of the hold event.

virtual void ui::Button::update ( )
virtual

This will update the state of the button. This method should be called periodically.
